summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Bank Info/IBAN feature for admin panel and user dashboard. All backend APIs (13/13 tests) passed. Frontend UI testing confirmed all features working correctly.
seed_data_creation: Test user admin@artchain.com has bank info saved for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Bank info feature fully tested. Admin triple authentication works. User can save bank info from dashboard Settings tab. Admin can view user bank info via View button in Users page.

admin_triple_authentication.details: Admin login requires email + password + admin secret key. All three must be correct.

admin_users_bank_info_column.details: Bank Info column shows 'View' button for users with bank info, 'Not provided' for others

bank_info_dialog.details: Dialog shows IBAN, Bank Name, Account Holder, SWIFT/BIC when clicking View button

user_dashboard_settings_tab.details: Settings tab displays bank info form with all fields and Save button

bank_info_save_endpoint.details: PUT /api/user/bank-info saves and persists bank information correctly

admin_sees_updated_bank_info.details: Admin can see user's updated bank info after user saves it

screenshots: .screenshots/admin_login_page.png - Admin login with triple auth fields
.screenshots/admin_users_page.png - Users page with Bank Info column
.screenshots/user_settings_tab.png - User dashboard Settings tab with bank form
.screenshots/bank_info_saved.png - Success toast after saving bank info
